DamageEntry.description: A list of damage entries that are noted on the attached file.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

type.title: Type
type.description: The abbreviation of the the damage entry type. Valid values are `B` (bent), `BB` (buffer), `BR` (broken), `C` (cut), `CR` (cracked), `D` (dented), `F` (faded) , `FF` (foreign), `G` (gouged), `L` (loose), `M` (missing), `P` (pitted), `PC` (paint), `R` (rubbed), `RU` (rusted), `S` (scratched), `SL` (soiled), `ST` (stained), `T` (torn).

segment.title: Segment
segment.description: The vehicle segment on which the damage entry is noted. Valid values are `front`, `back`, `left`, `right`, and `top`.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The date and time when the damage entry was noted.

location.title: Location
location.description: A GeoJSON object with the coordinates of the damage entry on the attached image file.

attachment.title: Attachment
attachment.description: The identifier of the attached image file on which the damage entry is noted.

attachment_id.title: Attachment id
attachment_id.description: The identifier of the attached image file on which the damage entry is noted.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

file.title: File
file.description: The URL for accessing the attached file.

image.title: Image
image.description: An object with the URLs of the full size and thumbnail image versions of the attached file.

damages.title: Damages
damages.description: A list of damage entries that are noted on the attached file.

load.title: Load
load.description: The identifier of the load to which the file is attached.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: The identifier of the user who created the attachment.

segment.title: Segment
segment.description: FIX_ME The vehicle segment to which the attached file applies.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the attached file.

original_file.title: Original file
original_file.description: The URL for accessing the original file that was replaced by this file.

height.title: Image Height
height.description: The height of the attached image file (in pixels).

width.title: Image Width
width.description: The width of the attached image file (in pixels).

active.title: Active
active.description: Indicates whether the URL for accessing the attached file is active.

share_with_driver.title: Share with driver
share_with_driver.description: Indicates whether driver users can access the attached file.

location.title: Location
location.description: A GeoJSON object with the GSP coordinates of the location associated with the attched file.

location_address.title: Location address
location_address.description: The full address of the location associated with the attached file as retrieved by the GPS coordinates.

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: Additional comments about the attached file.

create_time.title: Create time
create_time.description: The date and time when the attached file was originally created.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The date and time when something happened FIX_ME.

order.title: Order
order.description: The identifier of the load to which the file is attached.

vehicle.title: Vehicle
vehicle.description: The identifier of the vehicle to which the file is attached.

creator_id.title: Creator id
creator_id.description: The identifier of the user who created the attachment.

order_id.title: Order id
order_id.description: The identifier of the load to which the file is attached.

vehicle_id.title: Vehicle id
vehicle_id.description: The identifier of the vehicle to which the file is attached.

M22Damage.description: A list of damages noted for the vehicle according to the M-22 standard.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

area.title: Area
area.description: The unique code of the M-22 damage area.

type.title: Type
type.description: The unique code of the M-22 damage type.

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The unique code of the M-22 damage severity.

inspection_type.title: Inspection type
inspection_type.description: Indicates the inspection during which the M-22 damage is noted.

vehicle.title: Vehicle
vehicle.description: The identifier of the vehicle for which the M-22 damage is noted.

vehicle_id.title: Vehicle id
vehicle_id.description: The identifier of the vehicle for which the M-22 damage is noted.

NestedVehicle.description: A list of the vehicles in the load.

url.title: Url

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

vehicle_sketch.title: Vehicle sketch

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: A list of attached files associated with the vehicle.

type.title: Type

human_type.title: Human type
human_type.description: The human-readable name of the vehicle type.

logo.title: Logo

m22_damages.title: M22 damages
m22_damages.description: A list of damages noted for the vehicle according to the M-22 standard.

created.title: Created

deleting.title: Deleting
deleting.description: Indicates whether the vehicle is being removed from the load.

year.title: Year
year.description: The manufacture year of the vehicle (as specified by the shipper).

make.title: Make
make.description: The make of the vehicle (as specified by the shipper).

model.title: Model
model.description: The model of the vehicle (as specified by the shipper).

color.title: Color
color.description: The color of the vehicle (as specified by the shipper).

vin.title: Vin

buyer_number.title: Buyer number
buyer_number.description: The buyer number of the vehicle (as specified by the shipper).

lot_number.title: Lot number
lot_number.description: The LOT number of the vehicle (as specified by the shipper).

operable.title: Operable
operable.description: Indicates whether the vehicle is in an operable condition.

broker_vehicle_id.description: The unique identifier of the vehicle (as specified by the shipper).

specifications_data.description: The full specification data for the vehicle (including weight, length, height, and width) as retrieved from the vehicle specification database.

status.title: Status

pickup_odometer.title: Pickup odometer
pickup_odometer.description: The odometer reading of the vehicle as recorded by the driver at the time of pickup.

delivery_odometer.title: Delivery odometer
delivery_odometer.description: The odometer reading of the vehicle as recorded by the driver at the time of delivery.

pickup_location.title: Pickup location
pickup_location.description: A GeoJSON object with the GSP coordinates of the actual pickup location.

pickup_location_address.title: Pickup location address
pickup_location_address.description: The full address of the actual pickup location as retrieved from the GPS coordinates.

delivery_location.title: Delivery location
delivery_location.description: A GeoJSON object with the GSP coordinates of the actual delivery location.

delivery_location_address.title: Delivery location address
delivery_location_address.description: The full address of the actual delivery location as retrieved from the GPS coordinates.

pickup_night.title: Pickup night
